data.oai_dc:dc: Meta data 1.Grassland Grassland site where the exclosure was set up, overall there were 6 grassland sites 2.Vegetation Vegetation type, either short-grass or tall-grass 3.Treatment Type of exclosure: 1Control 2Deer 3Marmot 4Mouse 5Insect 4.Taxa species identity-8 species Trifolium repens Lotus corniculatus Festuca rubra Galium pumilum Carex sempervirens Crepis aurea Briza media Carex caryophyllea5.Life form function of species: grasses, sedges, forbs and legumes 6.SLA specific leaf area, leaf size divded by dry weight tissue, mm2/g 7. P leaf P, 8. C leaf C concentration (%) 9. N leaf N concentration (%)
